demarcation.translation[0].definitions[0: the point at which one area of work, responsibility etc ends and another begins
traditional lines of demarcation between medicine and surgery
demarcation.translation[0].definitions[1: the process of deciding on or marking the border between two areas of land
the exact demarcation of the north-south boundary
demarcation.translation[1].definitions[0: when different jobs are given to workers belonging to different trade unions
The company is trying to break down the lines of demarcation between skilled trades.
